This is a major leap forward, Gabrielle Giffords ' neurosurgeon, Dr. Michael Lemole, said Thursday about the scene Kirsten Gillibrand witnessed Wednesday.`` This is a major milestone for her, and we're hoping that she crosses through many more.''
